channel.title: Getting Started on Explore Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Explore Theme

item.title: Hello World: A Guide to Getting Started
item.description: This guide will walk you through the entire process of setting up a new Hugo site and installing the Explore theme. We’ll cover installing Hugo, creating a site, adding the theme, and basic configuration to get you up and running quickly.

item.title: Customizing Your Theme
item.description: Everything you need to personalize the look and feel of Explore â€” font presets, color palettes, custom primary and accent colors, container width, and a brief tour of the design token system underneath.
